name: cpptools
description: C/C++ IntelliSense, debugging, and code browsing.

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with C++ Development
walkthroughs.description: Dive into VS Code's rich C++ development experience.

steps.title: Install a C++ compiler
steps.description:
The C++ extension uses the C++ compiler on your system to configure IntelliSense for your project. 
[Check for C++ compilers](command:C_Cpp.CheckForCompiler)

steps.title: Install a C++ compiler
steps.description:
The C++ extension uses the C++ compiler on your system to configure IntelliSense for your project. 
[Check for C++ compilers](command:C_Cpp.CheckForCompiler)

steps.title: Install a C++ compiler
steps.description:
The C++ extension uses the C++ compiler on your system to configure IntelliSense for your project. 
[Check for C++ compilers](command:C_Cpp.CheckForCompiler)

steps.title: Open your project folder
steps.description:
Open an existing folder that contains your C++ project, or create a new folder. 
[Pick a folder](command:workbench.action.files.openFolder)

media.altText: A screenshot that shows a C++ project opened in the file Explorer.

steps.title: Configure C++ IntelliSense
steps.description:
Verify important IntelliSense settings like Compiler Path, Compiler Args, IntelliSense Mode, and Include Path. 
[Open IntelliSense Configuration](command:C_Cpp.ConfigurationEditUI?-2)

media.altText: A screenshot that shows the IntelliSense Configurations UI with important settings highlighted.

steps.title: Run and debug your C++ file
steps.description:
Create a default build task and debug configuration for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-clang-mac#_debug-helloworldcpp)

steps.title: Run and debug your C++ file
steps.description:
Create a default build task and debug configuration for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-linux#_debug-helloworldcpp)

steps.title: Run and debug your C++ file
steps.description:
Create a default build task and debug configuration for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-msvc#_debug-helloworldcpp)

steps.title: Install CMake Tools
steps.description:
Do you build your project with CMake? Install the CMake Tools extension to seamlessly build and debug your CMake project. 
[Install CMake Tools](command:workbench.extensions.installExtension?%22ms-vscode.cmake-tools%22)

media.altText: A screenshot of the CMake Tools extension page in the Marketplace.

steps.title: Lean back and get started
steps.description:
Watch this series of short and practical videos about setting up C++ IntelliSense and building and debugging C++ projects. 
[Watch Tutorials](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/introvideos-cpp)

media.altText: A screenshot with a preview of the video tutorial and a play button.

viewsWelcome.when: debugStartLanguage == cpp || debugStartLanguage == c || debugStartLanguage == cuda-cpp

keybindings.when: editorLangId == 'c' && editorTextFocus || editorLangId == 'cpp' && editorTextFocus || editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' && editorTextFocus

debuggers.label: C++ (GDB/LLDB)
debuggers._aiKeyComment: Ignore 'Property aiKey is not allowed'. See https://github.com/microsoft/vscode/issues/76493

debuggers.label: C++ (Windows)
debuggers._aiKeyComment: Ignore 'Property aiKey is not allowed'. See https://github.com/microsoft/vscode/issues/76493

editor/title/run.when: editorLangId == 'c' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile || editorLangId == 'cpp' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile || editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile

editorLangId == 'c' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile || editorLangId == 'cpp' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile || editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile

editor/title.when: editorLangId == 'c' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile && BuildAndDebug.isFolderOpen || editorLangId == 'cpp' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile && BuildAndDebug.isFolderOpen || editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile && BuildAndDebug.isFolderOpen

editor/context.when: config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'c' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp'

config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'c' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp'

config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'c' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' && editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp'

config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'Default' && editorLangId == 'c' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'default' && editorLangId == 'c' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'Default' && editorLangId == 'cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'default' && editorLangId == 'cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'Default' && editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'default' && editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp'

config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'Default' && editorLangId == 'c' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'default' && editorLangId == 'c' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'Default' && editorLangId == 'cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'default' && editorLangId == 'cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'Default' && editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' || config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine == 'default' && editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp'

editorLangId == 'c' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile && BuildAndDebug.isFolderOpen || editorLangId == 'cpp' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile && BuildAndDebug.isFolderOpen || editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' && config.C_Cpp.debugShortcut && BuildAndDebug.isSourceFile && BuildAndDebug.isFolderOpen

editorLangId == 'c' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' || editorLangId == 'cpp' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' || editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled'

editorLangId == 'c' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' || editorLangId == 'cpp' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled' || editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'disabled' && config.C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine != 'Disabled'

scripts.compile: node ./tools/prepublish.js && gulp generate-native-strings && gulp translations-generate && webpack --mode production --env vscode_nls
scripts.compile-watch: node ./tools/prepublish.js && gulp generate-native-strings && gulp translations-generate && webpack --mode production --env vscode_nls --watch --progress
